=The detector=
ConEmu has ability to highlight hyperlinks, files and compiler errors (file+line_number).
Just hover mouse with ‘Ctrl’ pressed.
May be configured on [SettingsHighlight Highlight] settings page.

<img src="http://conemu-maximus5.googlecode.com/svn/files/ConEmuFileLineHL.png" title="ConEmu FileLineDetector">

==Compiler errors==
Examples:

  * macro.cpp(1820) : error C4716
  * NewClass.ps1:35 ...
  * abc.py (3): ...

*Note!* File will not be highlighted if ConEmu can't find it in the [ShellWorkDir shell's current directory].

Action: File will be opened in the [SettingsHighlight specified editor] on the proper line if possible.

==Files==
File names or full paths produced from ‘dir’, ‘ls’, ‘git status’, ‘git diff’ and so on.

*Note!* File will not be highlighted if ConEmu can't find it in the [ShellWorkDir shell's current directory].

Action: will be opened in the default program ([http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/desktop/bb762153(v=vs.85).aspx ShellExecute]).

==Hyperlinks==
Examples:

  * http://www.fosshub.com/ConEmu.html
  * mailto:user@domain.com
  * file:///c:\\sources\\abc.html

Action: will be opened in the default program ([http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/desktop/bb762153(v=vs.85).aspx ShellExecute]).
